definition: in or near a center or constituting a center, a workplace that serves as a telecommunications facility where lines from telephones can be connected together to permit communication
details:
adjective
- in or near a center or constituting a center
- serving as an essential component
= synonyms: primal, cardinal, fundamental, key
noun
- a workplace that serves as a telecommunications facility where lines from telephones can be connected together to permit communication
= synonyms: exchange
